$schema.description: The schema version of the agent JSON entry

urlWebsite.description: An URL to the website of the agent with more information

logo.description: The URL to the logo of the agent

company.description: The name of the company or a community developing the agent

companyUrl.description: The url to the company website (not the product website)

contact.description: A link to a contact form or an email address for support requests

openSource.description: The agent source code is available under an open-source license

downloadSource.description: The URL to the source code, for example a github repository

license.description: The license(s) of the agent source code.

capability.description: The capabilities supported by the agent

type.description: The deployment model of the agent (e.g., cloud service or mobile app)

portability.description: Users can export their data from the agent and import them into another device/system

urlGooglePlayStore.description: link to the Google Play store

urlWebApp.description: Link to the web app - where the agent can be used with a browser

credentialProfiles.description: list of supported credential profiles, it has to be a valid credential profile from the Credential Profiles Comparison SIG
credentialProfiles.$comment: All values can be found here: https://openwallet-foundation.github.io/credential-format-comparison-sig/#/
